trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.

Component editors that are derived from the BaseDataListComponentEditor class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"></xref> class.

A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.

It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>, which represents the component to edit.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that represents the parent window.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
The index of the initial page in the array.
